location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Shaikh Abdoola bin Ahmed

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top right (recto) or top left (verso) corner of the folio. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right corner (recto) only, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.Condition: The item has suffered from insect damage and is difficult to read in places as parts of the text are missing.

mods.abstract: The letter regards hostilities between Shaikh Abdoola bin Ahmed and Rahma bin Jabir. It states that interference of the British Government has been withdrawn and he has informed Rahma of his being at liberty to prosecute attacks on Katiffe [Al-Qatif] and offensive measures with Bahrein [Bahrain] without opposition from British braziers.
